formatted_address: 65 Airport Boulevard, #01-25, Changi Airport, Terminal 3 Arrival Meeting Hall No, Singapore 819663
name: Heavenly Wang @ Changi Airport Terminal 3 Arrival Hall

reviews.text:
Tiny slices of bread, but excellent egg

The size of the bread for $6.2 is a let down! Its actually 4 pairs made out of 2 pair of bread cutting half. Tea is with condensed milk. And egg win it! No odor but exactly the jelly type cooked!

I was at the airport in the morning, and Heavenly Wang was one of the few places open for breakfast. I usually get the curry rice—one of the best, in my opinion. Their kaya toast is also good.

This time, I tried the rendang, but it was a bit salty for my liking. The Milo, however, was great—just the right balance between Milo and milk. The environment is nice, and it’s Halal too. Whether it’s packed in the morning depends on flight departures, so it can go either way.

DO NOT EAT HERE!

The laska prawn is so small and looks different from their menu picture.. this is frozen shrimp.. got cheated big time, huge disappointment especially when i got down flight from overseas and craving for some local food..

What is this man..

First meal after I landed. Came back from U.S. and miss local cuisine.

Decided to go with Heavenly Wang as it was right outside (very near) the carousel where I collected my luggage.

Order Laksa Set with Large Iced Milo and Kaya Butter Toast.

Laksa had lots of ingredients Prawns, Fish Cakes, Tau Pok & Bean Sprouts. The Laksa gravy was not the best (seems to be missing coconut or have too little of it) but after a week in U.S. it tasted really fantastic.

Iced Milo cannot go wrong. Full of Milo in the drink. Enjoy it thoroughly.

Kaya Butter Toast is good but lacking in Kaya Jam.

Overall a good price of $13.70.

It was 5.15ish (local time), I am looking for some food and saw that they have a Toast Set.

I was waiting in queue, I smiled and asked “Kaya…”, without even finishing my sentence he cut me in a very aggressive way “NO FOOD! DRINK ONLY!” He continuously talking without even look into my face - he completely ignore and scold me.

I am genuinely shocked by his behavior and manner. What took me personal was, there was this lady (probably local) who came before me. He served her nicely and even can make a nice joke with her. Racist much?

When I go to GMB to leave a review, I am not the only one who dissatisfied with the service here.

Not even tasting the food, but if the server has this kind of behavior, then what kind of food that he will serve?

I also not sure if management really takes care of the reviews, since some reviews about the service has been there for a long time. Yet, I still have this kind of experience.

vicinity: 65 Airport Boulevard, #01-25, Changi Airport, Terminal 3 Arrival Meeting Hall No
